name: Rockchip Firmware File
summary: Learn about .RFW files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: RFW files are used to store the factory-supplied firmware data as well as updates to the firmware. They can be modified using several tools in order to customize the look and feel of the media player.
Rockchip processors are developed by Fuzhou Rockchip Electronics.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
